code:
graph TD
    Person --> REPORT[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    REPORT --> CAPTCHA{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}
    CAPTCHA -->|YES| AUTO_CLASSIFIER{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController}
    CAPTCHA -->|NO| TRASH[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    AUTO_CLASSIFIER -->|YES| C_CROWD{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController}
    AUTO_CLASSIFIER -->|NO| NOTIFY_NO[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    NOTIFY_NO --> TRASH
    C_CROWD -->|YES| NOTIFY_YES[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    C_CROWD -->|NO| NOTIFY_NO
    NOTIFY_NO --> CLASSIFIER_TRAINER[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    CLASSIFIER_TRAINER -->|Update| AUTO_CLASSIFIER
    NOTIFY_YES --> CLASSIFIER_TRAINER[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    NOTIFY_YES --> ADD_EVENT[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
